ygData.subject: Re: does Bard need charisma?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Taking merchants from Indifferent to aimiable about doubles the price I get for selling goods, at least something like hunting bows (1gp+ before, 2gp+
ygData.messageBody:
>Will the song, Cinda`s Charismatic Carillon aid you in getting better prices
>for selling/buying items? Even if it just a few copper. I wonder.
>And playing this in the middle of freeport, its not gonna kill me is it?


Taking merchants from Indifferent to aimiable about doubles the price I get for selling goods, at
least something like hunting bows (1gp+ before, 2gp+ after). And yes, I am always afraid I will hit
lull instead of CCC haven't done it yet, but I keep them faaaaar from each other *laughs*

Tszaaz
